00001 /*****************************************************************************
00002  * Project: BaBar detector at the SLAC PEP-II B-factory
00003  * Package: 
00004  *    File: $Id: BdkDDalitzKsKPiAmp.rdl,v 1.2 2007/05/10 11:59:41 fwinkl Exp $
00005  * Description:
00006  *   Implementation of D -> Ks K- pi+ Dalitz amplitude
00007  *   Can also handle D -> Ks K+ pi- (piCharge in constructor)
00008  * History:
00009  *   11 Apr 2007, created, Frank Winklmeier

00014 #ifndef BDKDDALITZKSKPIAMP
00015 #define BDKDDALITZKSKPIAMP
00016 
00017 #include "BToDKTo3piK/BdkAbsDDalitzAmp.hh"
00018 
00019 class BdkDDalitzKsKPiAmp : public BdkAbsDDalitzAmp {
00020   // Static members: -------------------------------------------
00021 public:
00022   enum Component {KST0_1430  = 1,
00023                   KST        = 2,
00024                   KST1_1680  = 4,
00025                   KST2_1430  = 8,
00026                   KST0_1430P = 16,
00027                   KSTP       = 32,
00028                   KST1_1680P = 64,
00029                   KST2_1430P = 128,
00030                   A0M        = 256,
00031                   A0_1450M   = 512,
00032                   A2_1310M   = 1024,
00033                   NONRES     = 2048};
00034 
00035   enum ResType {BWRES = 0,
00036                 A0RES = 1};
00037   
00038   static int allComponents() {
00039     return KST0_1430 + KST + KST1_1680 + KST2_1430 +
00040       KST0_1430P + KSTP + KST1_1680P + KST2_1430P +
00041       A0M + A0_1450M + A2_1310M + NONRES;
00042    }
00043   
00044   
00045 
00046   // Instance members: -------------------------------------------
00047 public:
00049   BdkDDalitzKsKPiAmp(const char * name, const char * title, 
00050                      BdkDalitzBase * pdf,
00051                      Int_t componentsBit = allComponents(),
00052                      Int_t piCharge = +1);
00053   
00054   virtual  ~BdkDDalitzKsKPiAmp();
00055 
00056   virtual RooComplex customME(Double_t m12, Double_t m13, Int_t i) const;
00057   
00058   virtual void calDDbarNorm(int nEvents);
00059   virtual Double_t efficiency(Double_t m12, Double_t m13) const;
00060   virtual Double_t m12NormRange() const {return 3.0;}  // m(Ks K-)
00061   virtual Double_t m13NormRange() const {return 2.0;}  // m(Ks pi+)
00062   
00063 protected:
00064   // helpers:
00065   virtual void initResonance();
00066 
00067 
00068 private:
00069   Int_t _piCharge;    // charge of the pion (D -> Ks K+ pi- or Ks K- pi+)
00070 
00071   // coupling constants (squared) for coupled channel Breit-Wigner
00072   RooRealVar* _a0gEtaPi;
00073   RooRealVar* _a0gKK;
00074   
00075   BdkDDalitzKsKPiAmp(const BdkDDalitzKsKPiAmp & other);
00076 
00077   ClassDef(BdkDDalitzKsKPiAmp,1)
00078 
00079 };
